author: Dr15Jones
body:
#### PR description:

This is a demonstrator made up of a script and a python helper module which uses the new module python _construction_ ability in the framework to generate dummy _cfi.py files which ConfDB can parse.

These dummy _cfis inject dummy values in the cases where the parameters of the module are of type `cms.optional` or `cms.required` as those are not types ConfDB can handle.

#### PR validation:

Ran the script on a CMSSW_14_1_0_pre1 area and generated all cfi files. Tested if each one of the files would load properly in python. A few failed because of a file in <SubSystem>/<Package>/python which had the same name as the generated 'module construction' file. I made PRs changing those file names.
title: [RFC] Be able to generate dummy _cfi.py files for ConfDB parsing
